name: DihydrocodeineScheduleIIAndIII
title: Dihydrocodeine Schedule II and III
description: This value set includes semantic clinical drugs (SCD) and generic pack (GPCK) RxNorm codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to group Schedules II and III Dihydrocodeine medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that identify medications of dihydrocodeine),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent schedule I, V,  unscheduled, nonprescribable, non-human, and inactive Dihydrocodeine medications.)
